The Republic needs the cooperation of all its citizens to help with the war effort. Any citizen that wishes to help can learn special skills. You can learn to gather raw materials for crafting, help to craft new modifications for weapons and armor, or even send your companions on missions for rewards.
Locate your nearest crafting, gathering, or mission trainer today and help the Republic win the war.

The Republic was founded on the ideals of democracy. We are union of sovereign planets that strive to protect the galaxy and promote the values of peace and harmony.
In order to achieve this vast goal the Republic calls upon you, citizens and soldiers, to show the galaxy that we are one unified force, our bonds unbreakable.
Group up with Republic citizens and earn enough Social Points to reach Social Rank I. Once you reach Social Rank I, purchase a Republic Social Badge from Jeros Antonos located at the Equipment Requisitions on Coruscant.
